# Description

## Checklist

### Management

- [ ] Link Issue
- [ ] Add Description
- [ ] Assign Sprint
- [ ] Assign Moscow Prioritization

### Testing

- [ ] Functionality
- [ ] Coverage >= 80%

### Implementation

- [ ] Possible Optimizations
- [ ] Convention Usage

### Documentation

- [ ] Constructs (Structures, Classes, Extensions & Protocols)
- [ ] Properties
- [ ] Methods
- [ ] Usage Examples

### Review

- [ ] Assign Reviewer(s)
- [ ] Complexity & Readability
- [ ] Formatting
